def feven(pieces, n):
    res = 0
    for i in range(len(pieces)):
        res += abs(pieces[i] - 2 * (1 + i))
    return res
def fodd(pieces, n):
    res = 0
    for i in range(len(pieces)):
        res += abs(pieces[i] - (2 * (1 + i) - 1))
    return res


n = int(input())

pieces = list(map(int, input().split()))

pieces = sorted(pieces)

ans1 = feven(pieces, n)

ans2 = fodd(pieces, n)

print(min(ans1, ans2))

def getIntList():
    return list(map(int, input().split()));
def getTransIntList(n):
    first=getIntList();
    m=len(first);
    result=[[0]*n for _ in range(m)];
    for i in range(m):
        result[i][0]=first[i];
    for j in range(1, n):
        curr=getIntList();
        for i in range(m):
            result[i][j]=curr[i];
    return result;
